1.0.name: wordpress/profilactic
1.0.description:
WP-Profilactic publishes your LifeStream or informs readers where to find you online by parsing your aggregated activity mashup from Profilactic.com.

  • Lifestream Demo
  • Changelog

Features:

  • Aggregates your social networks, per your Profilactic.com account.
  • Dynamically pulls favicons for corresponding services.
  • Sidebar widgets for displaying recent lifestream posts or 'where to find me online'.

NOTE: SimplePie Core for WP is required if you run PHP4 and highly recommended for PHP5 installations. It aggregates and caches the feed data more efficiently that the native P
